Class ec.transform.CompoundClassFilter 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.CompoundClassFilter
public class CompoundClassFilter
extends Object
implements ClassFilter
A CompoundClassFilter is merely a ClassFilter which relies on a list of other ClassFilters to do its business.

CompoundClassFilter(ClassFilter[])
Construct a CompoundClassFilter with the given array of ClassFilters as the filters to use, in order.

transformClass(ClassFile)
Implementation of ClassFilter.transformClass().

CompoundClassFilter 
 public CompoundClassFilter(ClassFilter filters[])
Construct a CompoundClassFilter with the given array of ClassFilters as the filters to use, in order.

Parameters:
filters - the list of filters to apply

transformClass 
 public ClassFile transformClass(ClassFile cf) throws DoNotAdmitException
Implementation of ClassFilter.transformClass(). Does the obvious.
